latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At the time of inspection child care service was observed providing hair brushes and cloth towels for use by children
At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
Food preparation observed in areas not designed for food service Food prep area observed crowded and obstructed at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
